name: Anchorite
aura: Increases Ally HP in All Battles by 25%.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 10% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Warm Embrace

skills.desc: Removes 1 random debuff from all allies, then increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn.
skills.name: Prayer of Prowess

skills.desc: Fully heals a target ally, then places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
